sentence.Network_en: Poverty and illiteracy go together with high birth rates.
sentence.Network_cn: 贫困、文盲与高出生率密切相关。

sentence.Network_en: It is encouraging to read that illiteracy is declining.
sentence.Network_cn: 从读报中了解文盲情况正在好转,这是令人鼓舞的.

sentence.Network_en: The campaign to wipe out illiteracy launched out with great vigour.
sentence.Network_cn: 扫盲运动生气勃勃地展开了.

illiquid 非现金的；无流动资金的illiteracy 文盲，无知6、im-：来源于拉丁语。用在以字母“b”、“p”、“m”开始的词前面，后可接形容词、名词。如：.

entry.def: Illiteracy is the state of not knowing how to read or write.

auth_sentence.content: He clamours for articles filled with statistics about illiteracy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He clamours for articles filled with statistics about illiteracy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He clamours for articles filled with statistics about illiteracy.

auth_sentence.content: Money illiteracy is as restrictive as any other illiteracy.

stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+al……的→adj.文字[上]的;字面的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 文学上的,文学的;精通文学的,从事写作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+ary……的→adj.文学上的,文学的;精通文学的,从事写作的
il不+literacy[n.有文化,有教养,有读写能力]→没有文化→文盲

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有文化,有教养,有读写能力
stems_affixes.word_buile: liter文字,字母+acy性质,状态→n.有文化,有教养,有读写能力
liter文字,字母+ati表复数→文字人→文人学者
obliterate[v.涂掉,擦掉]+ion表名词→n.涂去, 删除
ob倒,去掉+liter文字,字母+ate表动词→去掉文字→擦掉

sentences.en: Illiteracy has been wiped out in our village.
sentences.cn: 我们村已经消灭了文盲。

sentences.en: It is encouraging to read that illiteracy is declining.
sentences.cn: 从读报中了解文盲情况正在好转,这是令人鼓舞的。
